settings.heading: KALKI Craftsmanship
settings.text: KALKI is a true contemporary fashion brand that appeals to the spirit of the modern woman who is bold, vibrant, inspired by traditions and freshly youthful. With a genuine blend of tradition with the chic in the world of fashion, KALKI offers luxury ethnic wear with international appeal and Indian grace.

custom_css: @media only screen and (max-width: 750px) {.inner-craft-img-first img {width: auto; max-width: 100%; }}

settings.heading: With Decades Of Experience
settings.text: With the finest fabrics, laces, beads and accessories, and years worth of experience, we have been the most loved bridal brand by producing fashionable and high quality outfits. Driven by the weaves of traditional & International artistry, one will find pure ethnic elegance mixed with a touch of present day styles as the ethos of this collection.

settings.heading: From Blueprint To Build
settings.text: The key aim is to own a design focused approach that comprises distinctive styles, intricate embroidery, splendid silhouettes & soft hues. One can find varied styles of outfits that are truly a mélange of contemporary classics.

settings.heading: Traditional Tool & Techniques
settings.text: Our main forte is interesting blends of opulent fabrics in the form of tulle, brocades, silk organzas and embroidered sheers. The clever color palette is an amalgam of all the colors of nature with dynamic hues.

settings.heading: Crafted With Love
settings.text: Smattering of light-weight and fun lehengas, tiered sharara, wedding anarkalis, classic sarees, and cocktail gowns to showstopper bridal lehengas boasts of seductive florals with 3D embellishments and intricate handiwork. Ideal fit for Mehendi, Sangeet or any occasion, the curated styles make for an easy addition to a woman’s trousseau collection.
settings.button_label: Watch Our Latest Fashion Week Collection

settings.heading: Fit To Perfection
settings.text: From start to finish the curated designs take nearly 18 to 20 karigars & over 1000 hours to finish, giving it the old world charm with the right balance of contemporary. They stitched to perfection for body types of all shapes and sizes. To better your customise-experience, KALKI stylist will make your D-day shopping feel good!Really really good.

settings.main_information_text: Our Stylists On Call Can Speak: English, Hindi, Gujarati & Marathi
